page.title: 07A Ladock Valley Duchy Farm
page.content:
Mr. and Mrs. Strongman live at Trendeal Vean Farm. Mr. Strongman was {born there}and his father farmed there for many years . The house was built a{hundred years}ago and it is part of the Arrallas Estate which is owned by the{Duchy of Cornwall.}Prince Charles has visited the farm and they have a Christmas present from him every year.
The farm has{270 acres;}this year there is 70 acres of{corn,}50 acres of {silage,}30 acres of{hay,}6 acres of {cabbages and turnips}and the rest is {grazing.}There are some{woods}on the land which Mr. Strongman uses for shooting{game birds.
The stock consists of 180{bullocks,}4} {cows}- each cow rears 5{calves}a year, 250{sheep}and 100{lambs.}He keeps sheep for wool and the lambs for meat.
